body: What people don't understand is that the coin needs to burn. Holding that much is just holding savings. it is the community's responsibility to reduce the amount of coins in circulation. This coin will never jump again. I currently have 2 lost wallets. One with 11 trillion coins and one with 7 trillion coins. I bought the 11 trillion for $75 etheirum on coin cloud digital ATM. I jumped on this coin the soonest I could. Unfortunately I didn't think about my wallet when I whipped the phone.

author: nickrock007
body: Buy utility coins not meme coins, meme coins are like going to vegas and gambling except you might have more fun in Vegas losing your money. There's tons of better coins to get into. Cut your losses and re invest. The only way to make money on meme coins is to get in super early and get out before the dump. You can still get your money back if you invest smart. I don't want to say what coins because I'll probably get booted for "promoting" something. The bull run is still a few months away. Play it smart and you can use your loss in shib to offset your capital gains taxes on your better investment. I was in your position myself and did what I'm telling you. I made millions and paid very little taxes from my huge losses on meme coins. But that just my opinion
